revised_title: Advances in Satellite Tracking and Orbital Analysis
tldr: This volume discusses the techniques of orbital analysis, covering satellite tracking methods, orbit determination, Earth's gravitational field, and the study of the upper atmosphere. The meeting brought together scientists from various disciplines to share their recent advances in the field. The papers presented at the meeting provide a detailed analysis of air density, temperature, and the behavior of the upper atmosphere at heights of 200 to 1200 km.
